node.html:
• At Automotive Artificial Intelligence I am working on a product Intelligent Traffic.
  • Traffic product is basically a simulation of real world traffic, using the stochastic and AI models.
  • Working on challenging topics like concurrency, threading and async is my daily routine.

• IAI was a sub-domain of AAI, later it merged into AAI
  • I worked on a really cool project which was Surveillance System
  • Creating it from scratch was an amazing journey for me, working with micro-services and realtime data pushed my limits to a whole another level

• Got understanding about how professionals manage such large code-base using Git and Github
  • Worked on professional tools like Jenkins, Jira and Slack
  • Created a face recognition model by using Neural Networks and transfer learning
